entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
